channel.title: Logs!?
channel.description:
Here is my problem : I have many players on my server and i want to know what they say when i am offline or AFK. I want to enable logs on a devolution 7.0 server.
Here is what you can do : Tell me how to enable logs on a devolution 7.0 server and if i have to make a folder or certain .txt files.
Please help me, thanks!
